[[File:Mr lancashire letter.jpg: On [[3 December]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
*'''Contents:''' Tolkien expresses his gratitude for the letter.
*'''Description:''' Preprinted/typewritten form letter (1 page) signed by "J.R.R. Tolkien" with handwritten "I much regret that I have no time for a longer answer"
*'''Publication:''' None. The letter was showed in the documentary "J.R.R. Tolkien The Origins of the Ring".

thumb]]:
Dear Mr. Lancashire,

Thank you very much for your kind letter. I am always pleased to hear from people who have read and enjoyed my books. I hope they will continue to give you pleasure.
Yours sincerely,
J. R. R. Tolkien

P.S. I much regret that I have no time for a longer answer.}}
